content.raw:
It appears that we don’t have access to the Docker image.  When I run…

```
docker pull mrvrx/vrx-submission:v1
```

I get this error

```
Error response from daemon: pull access denied for mrvrx/vrx-submission, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login': denied: requested access to the resource is denied
```

Please make sure the docker image is either public or accessible by the `virtualrobotx` user - see Submission Process Notes here: [#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/vrx\_challenge](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/vrx_challenge)
content.html:
It appears that we don’t have access to the Docker image. When I run…

docker pull mrvrx/vrx-submission:v1

I get this error

Error response from daemon: pull access denied for mrvrx/vrx-submission, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login': denied: requested access to the resource is denied

Please make sure the docker image is either public or accessible by the virtualrobotx user - see Submission Process Notes here: #!/osrf/vrx/wiki/events/19/vrx_challenge
